Name: Kneel next to the zombie and listen.
Text: Holding your breath from the stench you step forward.

Name: Ask why he tried to run away.
Text: As you speak to the zombie he suddenly erupts into a terrible growl.

Name: Ask for the ring.
Text: You sternly ask the zombie for the ring.

Name: Search the ashes.
Text: There seems to be something in the zombies remains.

Name: Destroy this creature and relieve him from his torment.
Text: Standing over the mumbling undead, you recite a funeral prayer.
